TopicTitle: [Help Needed]How to make scene of two plane attack each other?

Articles.Content:
I want to do as the title said.

But I don't know what to do to make two crafts fly in one game scene at the same time.

Is there anybody know what to do with my trouble?

THX a lot!

1-Spawn a new plane on the runway

2-Roll it OUT of the runway (very important for the next step)

3-Spawn another plane on the runway (the game sould not tell you the "craft on the runway" thing)

4-take off with one or the other (it's the same) and circle around as slow as you can to overfly the other plane

5- when within 2.5 km, you will be able to switch to the other plane (Alt Gr + [ or ]). Remember to stabilize with SAS!

6- take off ASAP and stay within 2.5 km from the other plane. If not, it will disappear!

7- Have fun!
